comments.content:
The closest I could find was Rob Leuschke's [Oh Ley](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725043050/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Oh+Ley/fonts/?refby=bowfin). I searched, MyFonts, Veer, Dafont and AbstractFonts.

- Mike Yanega
Thank you very much. That definitely looks closer than anything I found!

FWIW. Not the one, but good pieces... Party LET Plain.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725043050im_/http:/typophile.com/files/comp1_3730.jpg)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/party/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725043050/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/party/)  
No /C  
/o is right  
/m could be derived from two /n.  
No /p  
No /a  
/n is right  
No /i  
/n could be derived from halfa /m  
/s is pretty much there...
